content.rendered:
Whisk your family away to your own villa by the sea.

Make Magical Island Memories

explore more
01
about ajoma resort

See life from a different perspective

Amoja Resort is more than just a luxury resort; it is a tranquil oasis in paradise. With its stunning location, luxurious accommodations, and exceptional dining options, it offers guests an unforgettable experience.
Peaceful retreat

Relax and enjoy your stay with us, knowing that we've got you
covered every step of the way.

Romantic getaway

Relax and enjoy your stay with us, knowing that we've got you
covered every step of the way.

Family vacation

Relax and enjoy your stay with us, knowing that we've got you
covered every step of the way.

Special events

Relax and enjoy your stay with us, knowing that we've got you
covered every step of the way.

Previous
Next
02
featured facilities

Amenities and services

Outdoor pool
Our big-sized swimming pool, conveniently located in clubhouse
Airport pickup
We’ll pick up from airport while you comfy on your ride.
Free parking
Please consider your private parking or better yet.
Fitness center
Fully equipped gym and fitness for your workout regime, anytime of the day.
Room service
With our service you may enjoy the finest life in our resort.
Free wifi
Our big-sized swimming pool, conveniently located in clubhouse
Meeting room
The largest hotel conference and events space in Luanda.
Spa & wellness
Let our expert treatments pave the way for your journey to well-being.

04
explore

A fun-packed family adventure

Nestled 90 meters above sea level, our resort-style hotel features 29 full-service rooms and 16 luxurious suites which offer uninterrupted views one of the world’s most romantic destinations.

Restaurant & Bars

"Thank you for a truly amazing stay! Your hospitality is quite outstanding. The sports centre is also very good with excellent quality tennis courts. Hope to be back soon."
Annie Hebert Review from TripAdvisor
“We arrived early and we couldn't check but were exhausted. As soon as a room was cleaned and ready we were checked in at 10:30 not 3pm. This was extremely good.”
conie corleone Review from TripAdvisor
"Check but were exhausted. As soon as a room was cleaned and ready we were checked in at 10:30 not 3pm. This was extremely good service from the staff.”
jonny fontane Review from TripAdvisor
